Uses of Interface
org.sercho.masp.space.event.EventedTupleSpace

Packages that use EventedTupleSpace
org.sercho.masp.space Contains basic space types. 
org.sercho.masp.space.event Defines the EventedTupleSpace which sends events about occurrences in the space. 
 

Uses of EventedTupleSpace in org.sercho.masp.space
 

Classes in org.sercho.masp.space that implement EventedTupleSpace
 class SecureSpaceWrapper<T>
          SecureSpaceWrapper adds access control functionality to a given EventedTupleSpace.
